text: Until the man himself sends signals over social media, we may never know. If we were the betting kind, we’d say that after seeing so much change on the singer in a matter of days, odds are he’ll find even more time in the salon chair before the week is over — whether it’s for another hair transformation (facial or otherwise), more fresh ink, or maybe even a facial or massage — thatself care life seems to agree with the man.
